title: 484: Optimizing Performance & Health in Times of Stress
description: The fitness industry is great at pumping people up, pushing for more intensity and equating success and moving forward with how hard you push. However, is this the best way to optimize performance, health and even your gains in the gym, especially if you are pushing yourself in multiple areas? Probably not. In this episode Sal, Adam and Justin talk about how to optimize your performance and health and maintain balance in times of stress.
